title: Tried to delete 50 people in messaging all at once messaging is blinking been jammed for 6 hours
content:
I tried to delete like 50 people at once with many many text messages in each person's thread.
That was like 6 to 8 hours ago and it's still blinking not finished deleting.
I have tried shutting off the phone taking out the SIM card and resetting it many times
